Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2: Complete MVP implementation with Discord OAuth authentication

Architecture:
- Discord OAuth via Playwright for JWT Bearer token acquisition
- Token validation and persistence in config.json
- Stateful pagination with crash recovery via download-state.json
- Atomic file operations using .downloading pattern
- Retry logic with exponential backoff \(max 2 attempts\)
- Automatic cleanup of orphaned incomplete downloads

Core modules:
- src/auth-discord.js: Discord OAuth flow, token extraction, config management
- src/index.js: Main orchestrator \(auth â†’ validate â†’ setup â†’ download loop â†’ summary\)
- src/api.js: API communication \(fetchGenerations, getDownloadUrl, getUserInfo\)
- src/downloader.js: Download logic with .downloading pattern and retry wrapper
- src/state.js: State persistence for pagination resume and failed track tracking
- src/utils.js: Filename sanitization utility

State tracking:
- lastOffset: Resume pagination from last batch
- downloaded/skipped/failed: Statistics tracking
- failed[]: Array of failed generation IDs for retry

Production-ready features:
- Idempotent execution: can re-run safely at any time
- Skip existing files by size verification
- Clean up incomplete .downloading files on startup
- Progressive state saves every 10 tracks
- Reset state on complete success for next sync
